price: ወይም በሰማይ ውስጥ ያለን በእናንተ ላይ ጠጠርን ያዘለች ነፋስን ቢልክባችሁ ትተማመናላችሁን? (አትፈሩምን?) ማስጠንቀቄም እንዴት እንደኾነ ወደፊት ታውቃላችሁ፡፡
arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
